description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Blast (3)

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Everyone in blast range must make -30 Toughness Test or be Blinded for 1d10 Rounds. Flash protections do not grant immunity, but instead make test -10. Works like a normal Flash Grenade out to 20 metres, requiring +0 Toughness Test or blinding for 1d5 rounds.
